translations.By default, the simulation starts at equ: By default, the simulation starts at equilibrium on Earth in 1850, but you can select a different period or planet
translations.Display radiation as either Waves (quali: Display radiation as either Waves (qualitative) or Fluxes arrows (quantitative)
translations.Click Play to begin the simulation: Click Play to begin the simulation
translations.To change Earth's climate, pause the sim: To change Earth's climate, pause the simulation and alter one or more variables
translations.Blinking flux arrows indicate that the E: Blinking flux arrows indicate that the Earth is not at equilibrium and that these fluxes are projected to change
translations.Click Play again to see how the temperat: Click Play again to see how the temperature and the fluxes evolve
